author: Megan Ellis
title: Hilarious responses to Airbnb campaign
text:
Hilarious responses to Airbnb campaign Article By: Megan Ellis Fri, 17 Jul 2015 8:03 AM Share Your Email 
Accommodation booking site Airbnb's latest ad campaign took a bit of a creepy turn - with a hilarious response from Twitter users. 
The ad campaign encourages people to get to know humankind by living in different people's worlds, but the execution of the campaign comes out a bit Norman Bates-y. 
What was meant to promote empathy seemed to a bit more like a handbook for stalkers. 
These are some of the tweets Airbnb posted as part of their campaign:
